content:
# It seems that I encountered another error while trying to insert iron ore into the furnace because I currently have no iron ore in my inventory.
# This indicates that the previous attempt to insert iron ore was not successful, likely due to the error that occurred when trying to insert coal.

# Let's check the inventory to confirm the current state of resources before proceeding further.
print(f"Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check of inventory before taking further action

# Since I have no iron ore left, I will need to return to the nearest iron ore patch and gather some more iron ore.
# Let's find the nearest iron ore patch again.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
print(f'Nearest iron ore position: {iron_position}')  # Verifying the position of the nearest iron ore patch

# Move to that position and harvest some iron ore.
move_to(iron_position)  # Moving to the nearest iron ore position
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=25)  # Harvesting enough iron ore for smelting
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting iron ore
